src:
Tumbang Lawan Levante, Busquets: Barcelona Tidak Bermain Terlalu Buruk
03 Nov 2019, 04:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang Barcelona, Sergio Busquets mengomentari kekalahan 3-1 timnya atas Levante. Busquets menilai bahwa skor akhir tidak bisa menjadi tolak ukur performa timnya di pertandingan tersebut.
Kemarin malam, Barcelona bertandang ke Estadi Ciutat de Valencia. Mereka menantang Levante untuk pertandingan jornada ke-12 La Liga musim ini.
Di laga tersebut, Barcelona berhasil unggul terlebih dahulu melalui gol Lionel Messi. Namun tuan rumah membalas di babak kedua berkat gol Jose Campana, Borja Mayoral dan Nemanja Radoja.
Busquets menilai meski gawang timnya bobol tiga kali, timnya disebut bermain dengan baik di laga itu. "Saya rasa pertandingan hari ini cukup berimbang," buka Busquets kepada Marca.

Baca komentar lengkap sang gelandang selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Down with Levante, Busquets: Barcelona Don't Play Too Bad
Nov. 03 2019, 04:20 by Bola.net
Barcelona - Barcelona midfielder Sergio Busquets commented on his team's 3-1 defeat to Levante. Busquets considered that the final score could not be a measure of his team's performance in the match.
Last night, Barcelona visited Estadi Ciutat de Valencia. They challenged Levante for the 12th La Liga match this season.
In that match, Barcelona succeeded in winning first through a Lionel Messi goal. But the hosts responded in the second half thanks to goals from Jose Campana, Borja Mayoral and Nemanja Radoja.
Busquets considered that although his team's goal was broken three times, his team was said to play well in that match. "I think today's match is quite balanced," Busquets said to Marca.

Read the complete midfielder's full comments below.
